title: This Wand for Hire
description: FantasyTags Fantasy, paranormal, contemporary fantasy, witches, vampires, wands, warlocks“…brings the total of mysterious deaths in Clarke County to seventeen,” the TV announcer was saying as Jinny Parker walked into the living room from the garage. “Law enforcement is baffled by the bodies found drained of blood, apparently through two small punctures in the jugular vein. We'll have more on this at seven. And now, the weather…”Jinny, her husband Ken, and Ken's sister Alicia, said almost in chorus, “Vampires!”Vampires in the next county, and then vampires infiltrating the faculty at Montcalm College where Ken teaches. Ken and Jinny's coven, and several other covens, join up with the Sheriff to battle the vampires.But then, in the middle of the fight, Jinny is kidnapped by the vampires and “turned.” How are they going to get her back?
author: James Hartley
